title: ହୋମ - Gloria.tv
text:
Novus Ordo Disaster: Diocese Loses Twenty Percent of Priests in Five Years
The diocese of Girona (680,000 Catholics) in Catalonia, Spain, went from 128 priests in January 2020 to 102 priests in January 2025, writes the Diari de Girona. This means that the diocese has lost 20…ଅଧିକ
This means that the diocese has lost 20% of its priests in five years. There are no signs of recovery.
In 2000 there were 246 diocesan priests, which means that in a quarter of a century 144 have been lost, or 59% of the clergy.
Of the 102 living priests in Girona, 25 are retired, and Girona has by far the highest average age of clergy in Catalonia.
The current bishop of Girona, Monsignor Octavi Vilà Mayo, 63, is a Cistercian monk who was ordained a priest only in 2015 and was elected abbot of his monastery, Santa Maria de Poblet, in the same year.
According to GerminansGerminabit.Blogspot.com (19 February), he became a bishop to take over a diocese that nobody else wanted.
The blog finds it difficult to understand how a diocese in an almost comatose state, in need of a dynamic bishop with experience in complex situations and a …

Church 02 22 2025 Pope’s No. 2: Resignation rumors ‘useless speculation’ The Pope's secretary of state says that talk of Pope Francis resigning is pointless. Cardinal Ravasi says the decision is just …ଅଧିକ
Pope’s No. 2: Resignation rumors ‘useless speculation’
The Pope's secretary of state says that talk of Pope Francis resigning is pointless. Cardinal Ravasi says the decision is just the Pope's to make.
Cardinal Secretary of State Pietro Parolin told the Italian daily Corriere della Sera that talk of a papal resignation is “useless speculations” and that he prefers “not to meddle” in the “uncontrolled rumors” and “inappropriate comments.” The debate is pointless, he added.
He also said he had not seen the 266th pope since his hospitalization, though he has only been back in Rome since Wednesday, after an official visit to Burkina Faso.
“I have let him know that I am available to meet with him if he deems it necessary, but so far this has not been the case.” And he added: ”Thank God the news from Gemelli is encouraging; he is recovering. Files have been sent to him, which means that things are going well.”
“In this regard,” the cardinal said, “it is better for him to …

Pope had two complications today, condition still critical
The Holy Father spent the day in his chair, "although in more pain than yesterday" after a prolonged asthmatic-like respiratory crisis this morning.
The customary evening
[statement](https://gloria.tv/go/snnf12RjPpFjHXS3XreJQ4E6zBN0tC26W2iAQfP85OowFWFZlkpJzAiNYlsdJoM2CvpThNcXeayIg4VlQYY4lOT6yGDggHvjqX62oLyIbmyOD3jS1p7R6leCAB0ulE7PyxEtKd5Rmf2TTEfyL4CNTgF5a0bVnHjlM81Y8eJ5LtLnqzxsMDsAtehnqHI)on Pope Francis' health reported two negative developments today, February 22, the day the Church is celebrating the Feast of the Chair of St. Peter.
"This morning, Pope Francis presented an asthmatic-like respiratory crisis of a prolonged nature, which also required the application of high-flow oxygen," the Holy See informed.
As well, "blood tests also showed thrombocytopenia, associated with anemia, which required the administration of blood transfusions."
Thus, the report said, for the moment doctors are not making a prognosis. "The prognosis remains guarded," it said. "The condition of the Holy Father continues to be critical. Therefore, as explained yesterday, the Pope is not out of danger."
"The Holy Father continues to be alert and spent …

L’ipocrisia clericale è quella di cardinali che rilasciano interviste a quotidiani che ogni giorno parlano male del clero e affermano che è inutile speculare sulle dimissioni del Papa. Ravasi, Parolin e Fernandez parlano di dimissioni affermando che non bisogna parlarne.
Solitamente quando qualcuno non vuole che si parli di qualcosa tace, non passa il proprio tempo a dare voce alle speculazioni affermando di non speculare.
Testo e foto da pagina facebook di SilereNonPossum
